/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings that reach up towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. Cars and buses navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural grandeur.
